H0.text: what book of the bible is the song of solomon in. Ecclesiastes

H1.text: what book of the bible is the song of solomon in. Proverbs

H2.text: what book of the bible is the song of solomon in. Psalms

H3.text: what book of the bible is the song of solomon in. Song of Songs

A4.text: The Song of Songs is a biblical poem, one of the five megillot ('scrolls') in the Ketuvim ('writings'), the last section of the Tanakh.

A5.text: The book is also referred to as the 'Song of Solomon', meaning the song 'of', 'by', 'for', or '[dedicated] to' Solomon.
